snippet: Silvio Berlusconi said he would consider not running for prime minister if the incumbent, Mario Monti, runs as the leader of a center-right coalition.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi says he will consider withdrawing his bid to run for office if Prime Min Mario Monti runs as leader of center-right coalition.
lead_paragraph: Silvio Berlusconi said he would consider not running for prime minister if the incumbent, Mario Monti, runs as the leader of a center-right coalition.

headline.seo: Berlusconi Says Return Hinges on Whether Monti Runs
headline.main: Berlusconi Says Return Hinges on Incumbent
headline.print_headline:
Italy: Berlusconi,Muddying Issue,
Says He Might Cede to Monti
